text: Gilles Devers, born in 1956, is a French lawyer and academic. He has represented the Palestinian Authority before the International Court of Justice.French lawyer files complaint against Israel at ICC, france24.com, 25 July 2014Hague court under western pressure not to open Gaza war crimes inquiry, The Guardian, 18 August 2014 ==References== Category:French lawyers Category:Living people Category:1956 births
title: Gilles Devers
